mapper.sql: spid, spname, spperson, sptel, spemail, spaddress, sppersonTel, spfax, sparea, spremark, res1, res2, res3, res4
mapper.select:
select
from shippoint where res1=0 limit ${start},${pagesize}
mapper.delete: update shippoint set res1='1' where spid = #{spid}
mapper.insert: insert into shippoint (spname, spperson, sptel, spemail, spaddress, sppersonTel, spfax, sparea, spremark, res1, res2, res3, res4) values ( #{spname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sppersontel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{res2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{res3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{res4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update shippoint
spname = #{spname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spperson = #{spperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sptel = #{sptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spemail = #{spemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spaddress = #{spaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sppersonTel = #{sppersontel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spfax = #{spfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sparea = #{sparea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spremark = #{spremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
res2 = #{res2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
res3 = #{res3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
res4 = #{res4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where spid = #{spid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
